name: Haste
effect:
:ongoing: Until the end of the Combat, the selected [unit](../units/index.md) gains:

:empower: 0 ➣ +1 :initiative:
:empower: 1 ➣ +2 :initiative:
:empower: 2 ➣ +3 :initiative:

— OR —

:instant: +1 :empower:
notes: [^1] On the small battlefield, only the initiative of the unit is increased, not its movement range. On the Battlefield Expansion, the initiative is used to determine the movement range, therefore a unit under this spell has its movement range increased as well.
